article_title: 'Evacuating was a mistake': Israelis push to return to border homes
sentence: Kfar  Aza  -  only  2km  (1.2  miles)  from  Gaza  -  was  one  of  the  first  places  targeted  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  7  October,  in  co-ordinated  attacks  that  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel,  and  saw  more  than  240  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: 'Evacuating was a mistake': Israelis push to return to border homes
sentence: "Our  next-door  neighbour,  who  was  a  very  good  friend,  was  murdered,"  she  says.

article_title: 'Evacuating was a mistake': Israelis push to return to border homes
sentence: The  war  has  killed  almost  30,000  Gazans,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  and  the  prime  minister  is  under  growing  pressure  to  agree  a  ceasefire  deal  to  ease  Gaza's  suffering  and  free  more  than  100  hostages  still  being  held  by  Hamas.
